bug.short_desc: liveusb-creator 3.90.0-1.fc24.noarch does not start in Fedora-KDE-Live-x86_64-24_Alpha-7.iso

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: liveusb-creator 3.90.0-1.fc24.noarch does not start in Fedora-KDE-Live-x86_64-24_Alpha-7.iso
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): liveusb-creator 3.90.0-1.fc24.noarch
How reproducible: select menu item . It does start from root terminal "Custom OS" does not work; crashes LUC; error:"Qwidget: cannot create a Qwidget without QApplication"
https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1310542#c7
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info: liveusb-creator does not start in Fedora-KDE-Live-x86_64-24_Alpha-7.iso install to HD (updated 6 april 2016)unless called from terminal.
Only f23.iso's are offered (Downloaded to Home)
Only Fedora Workstation and Fedora Server are offered in first screen Custom OS does not work crashes LUC; error:"Qwidget: cannot create a Qwidget without QApplication"
Other spins are partially hidden behind [----] (Including Fedora KDE Plasma Desktop)

Try retesting with http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/packageinfo?packageID=6691 and don't forget to manually install qt5-qtgraphicaleffects.x86_64 until there's a newer build that drags it in automatically.

http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/packageinfo?packageID=6691 http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=747137
liveusb-creator-3.91.0-1.fc24.noarch.rpm
Tested: 10/06/2016
Only starts in root terminal
Custom OS does not work crashes LUC; error:"Qwidget: cannot create a Qwidget without QApplication"
Only f23.iso's are offered (Downloaded to Home)
Other spins are partially hidden behind [----] (Including Fedora KDE Plasma Desktop)
qt5-qtgraphicaleffects.x86_64 already installed with update
troubleshooting with mbriza http://fpaste.org/354060/

http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/packageinfo?packageID=6691 http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=753459 (f24 rpm) starts from icon; sees f24 .iso in home; currently writing to usb; finished.
liveusb-creator-3.92.1-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ff4136b90c

dnf update --enablerepo=updates-testing liveusb-creator
worked in Fedora-KDE-Live-x86_64-24-20160411.n.1.iso in f23 QEMU/kdm

(In reply to satellitgo from comment #6) > dnf update --enablerepo=updates-testing liveusb-creator > > worked in Fedora-KDE-Live-x86_64-24-20160411.n.1.iso in f23 QEMU/kdm
but booted live is not writable

Yes, overlay support was removed for the sake of reliable basic functionality. However, I'm planning to look into it after F24 is released, it is likely it'll be possible to get permanent overlay back.

(In reply to satellitgo from comment #9) > kde > if you're on f24, you can just do dnf update --enablerepo=updates-testing > liveusb-creator (LUC is in live) > > workstation: > if you're on f24, you can just do dnf install --enablerepo=updates-testing > liveusb-creator (LUC is not installed)
Tested versions: Fedora-Workstation-Live-x86_64-24-20160409.n.0.iso created in KDE f24 LUC install to USB>HD
I don't understand. You're not able to install the tool in Workstation?

(In reply to Martin Bříza from comment #11) > I don't understand. You're not able to install the tool in Workstation?
"dnf update" does not work as LUC is not included in Workstation.
"dnf install" is the needed command.
Ah, I see. That's intentional though.
liveusb-creator-3.93.1-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ff4136b90c

liveusb-creator-3.93.1-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-ff4136b90c
verified per bodhi comment
